title: Where did the Webnovel come from? - Quora

response.answer_text: Webnovel is an English translated site that host most of the stories originating from their parent site Qidian. It features Chinese translated works, along with other of the more popular works from other Asian countries. Recently the site has launched a create section for Authors who are willing to share their work on the site. Lots of Original stories have filled the site, including my own The Red Lands. For binge Readers or for those looking to do a spot of light reading, the site host many novels of different genre to choose from. It also allows Authors to be paid for their work, but this venture is still in the works for new Writers. Hope this helps and good luck reading.
